name: App For Small Oil Company
description: Created a small app for an oil company that helped potenitally save Â£45 million for the company. This was based on optimising total measured depth by placing drill oil centres in optimal loactions.

name: ENTC Mallorca Triathlon
description: Came in fourth place in my first triathlon in a small event that our trithlon team hosted during a training camp in Mallorca.

name: Meadows Marathon
description: On March 3rd 2019 I completed the Meadows Marathon in 4 hours 45 minutes and 19 seconds.

name: NC500
description: After the UK Covid-19 lockdown during the summer of 2020, a group of 5 of us did Scotland's NC500 on bikes. We camped for 7 nights and cycled every day inbetween for a total of 8 days cycling at around 100km per day.

name: Stirling Aquathon
description: Competed in my first aquathon in Stirling in 2018. I Came in last place but probably had the best finishing smile.
